overview: Last winter, it wasn’t hard finding the soul across twelve small, independent resorts in North America. These mountains had more rich character and stories to tell than we could've ever imagined possible. Finally, we are here to share that with you.  Produced in partnership with Indy Pass, Filson, and Entabeni Systems, In Pursuit of Soul brings you to Wyoming's Snow King, Maine's Saddleback and Black Mountain, Washington's Mission Ridge and 49° North Mountain Resort, Vermont's Magic Mountain and Bolton Valley, Idaho's Lost Trail and Brundage Mountain, New Hampshire's Cannon Mountain, Massachusetts' Berkshire East Mountain Resort, and Utah's Beaver Mountain.
tagline: Teton Gravity Research presents: A short documentary on independent mountain resorts
title: In Pursuit of Soul
